title: Inception
description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller. A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Dark Knight
description: A dark and gritty superhero action movie. Batman faces his greatest psychological test against the Joker, who wreaks havoc and chaos on Gotham.

title: Interstellar
description: An epic space travel adventure. A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival. Features time dilation, black holes, and father-daughter relationships.

title: Parasite
description: A dark social satire about greed and class discrimination. The destitute Kim clan infiltrates the wealthy Park family. Suspenseful and shocking.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The ultimate superhero showdown. The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe. Packed with fights and heroes.

title: The Matrix
description: A cyberpunk sci-fi classic. A computer hacker learns the true nature of his reality and fights a war against the machine controllers. Features kung-fu and simulation theory.

title: The Hangover
description: A hilarious funny comedy about a bachelor party gone wrong in Las Vegas. Three buddies try to find their missing friend after a wild night they cannot remember.

title: Superbad
description: A funny coming-of-age comedy. Two high school seniors deal with separation anxiety and a wild party plan that goes completely wrong.

title: The Notebook
description: A heartbreaking and emotional romantic drama. A poor young man falls in love with a rich woman, but social differences drive them apart. A classic love story.

title: Get Out
description: A scary psychological horror thriller. A young man visits his girlfriend's parents and uncovers a disturbing and terrifying secret.

title: The Shining
description: A classic scary horror movie. A family stays at an isolated hotel where a sinister presence drives the father to violence. Terrifying and creepy.
